relevant_findings.general: Diaphoretic skin, pupils equal and reactive to light, gaze deviated upward, rapid and mostly unintelligible speech.
relevant_findings.neurological: Agitated, flailing arms and legs, unable to cooperate during examination, paranoid speech mentioning attacks.

relevant_findings.general: Developed ventilation-associated pneumonia due to methicillin-sensitive Staphylococcus aureus.
relevant_findings.neurological: Initially unable to communicate, later had a period of agitation with copious oral secretions.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially very agitated, then quieter; reintubated due to agitation and copious oral secretions.
